io.github.deleuze199

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.deleuze199.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Controller Class for the UI part of the program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToProductionDB(java.util.ArrayList<io.github.deleuze199.ProductionRecord> productionRun)
      The addToProductionDB method loops through the productionRun, inserting productionRecord object information into the ProductionRecord database table.
      void employeeCreateBtHandler()
      The employeeCreateBtHandler method is handler to create an object of type Employee.
      void initialize()
      The initialize method calls setupProductLineTable, associates the ObservableList with the Product Line ListView, calls loadProductList, calls loadProductionLog, populates numbers 1-10 in the ComboBox, populates the ItemType enum class into ChoiceBox, populates the TableView and ListView.
      void loadProductionLog()
      The loadProductionLog method creates ProductionRecord objects from the records in the ProductionRecord database table, populates the productionLog ArrayList, and calls showProduction.
      void loadProductList()
      The loadProductList method creates Product objects from the Product database table and add them to the productLine ObservableList.
      void productLineButtonHandler()
      The productLineButtonHandler method is a handler for when the "Add Product" button is click.
      void recordProductionBtnHandler()
      The produceBtnHandler method is a handler for when the "Record Production" button is clicked.
      java.lang.String reverseString(java.lang.String pw)
      This method reverses the order of the password to the database.
      void setupDB()
      The setupDB method sets all of the credentials needed to access the database.
      void setupProductLineTable()
      The setupProductLineTable method associates the columns of the TableView with the fields of the ObservableList.
      void showProduction()
      The showProduction method populates the TextArea on the Production Log tab with the information from the productionLog.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()

    • Method Detail

      • productLineButtonHandler

        public void productLineButtonHandler()
        The productLineButtonHandler method is a handler for when the "Add Product" button is click. This method inserts added product into database and calls loadProductList.

      • recordProductionBtnHandler

        public void recordProductionBtnHandler()
        The produceBtnHandler method is a handler for when the "Record Production" button is clicked. This method gets the selected product from the Product Line ListView, gets the quantity from the comboBox, creates an ArrayList of ProductionRecord objects named productionRun, sends the productionRun to an addToProductionDB method, calls loadProductionLog, and calls showProduction.

      • setupProductLineTable

        public void setupProductLineTable()
        The setupProductLineTable method associates the columns of the TableView with the fields of the ObservableList.

      • loadProductList

        public void loadProductList()
        The loadProductList method creates Product objects from the Product database table and add them to the productLine ObservableList.

      • loadProductionLog

        public void loadProductionLog()
        The loadProductionLog method creates ProductionRecord objects from the records in the ProductionRecord database table, populates the productionLog ArrayList, and calls showProduction.

      • addToProductionDB

        public void addToProductionDB(java.util.ArrayList<io.github.deleuze199.ProductionRecord> productionRun)
        The addToProductionDB method loops through the productionRun, inserting productionRecord object information into the ProductionRecord database table.
        Parameters:
        productionRun - is an ArrayList of ProductionRecord objects to be inserted into the database

      • showProduction

        public void showProduction()
        The showProduction method populates the TextArea on the Production Log tab with the information from the productionLog.

      • employeeCreateBtHandler

        public void employeeCreateBtHandler()
        The employeeCreateBtHandler method is handler to create an object of type Employee. Then sets the employeeOutputLabel the the object.toString function.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        The initialize method calls setupProductLineTable, associates the ObservableList with the Product Line ListView, calls loadProductList, calls loadProductionLog, populates numbers 1-10 in the ComboBox, populates the ItemType enum class into ChoiceBox, populates the TableView and ListView.

      • setupDB

        public void setupDB()
        The setupDB method sets all of the credentials needed to access the database.

      • reverseString

        public java.lang.String reverseString(java.lang.String pw)
        This method reverses the order of the password to the database.
        Parameters:
        pw - backward password being passed in
        Returns:
        actual pw
